title.rendered: Become a Medical Volunteer In Ukraine

content.rendered:
Become A Medical Volunteer in Ukraine

There are two most common and recommended ways to join Ukraine’s medical volunteers – by applying through the official website of Ministry of Health of Ukraine or by joining paramedic and medical volunteering organization working in Ukraine. We are constantly trying to find more ways to help civilians and the army, including joining local hospitals in Ukraine and adding more non-governmental organizations (NGO) to our list below. 

Volunteer for “Ministry of Health of Ukraine”

On February 27, 2022, the Ministry of Health of Ukraine posted official instructions how to join medical volunteers in Ukraine. 

Our team contacted government officials about this volunteering opportunity, and they confirmed that they prefer to work with medical teams with previous work experience during conflicts, wars and disasters. However, individual medics can also apply.

  1. You can sign up on the Ministry of Health of Ukraine English website by filling out a form: https://bit.ly/questionnaire_UA
  2. Additionally, you can send your resume to the email address: ukrainemedhelp@gmail.com
    Read more details here: https://en.moz.gov.ua/article/news/we-invite-our-foreign-colleagues-to-work-in-medical-institutions-during-this-difficult-time
  3. Lastly, if you don’t hear from the above contacts due to a high volume of emails, you can apply to diplomatic missions of Ukraine in your country. Here is the complete list of Ukrainian diplomatic institutions worldwide: https://mfa.gov.ua/en/foreign-diplomatic-institutions-ukraine
submit application

 

Volunteer for “Doctors Without Borders” (NGO)

An international humanitarian medical non-governmental organization (NGO) “Doctors Without Borders” or Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is conducting medical and humanitarian response in Ukraine and neighboring countries. 

  1. You can learn more about their medical work in Ukraine here: https://www.doctorswithoutborders.org/what-we-do/where-we-work/ukraine
  2. To become a volunteer, please submit your application here:  https://www.doctorswithoutborders.org/careers/work-field/find-role
Become a Volunteer AT MSF

 

Volunteer for “Global Response Management “(NGO)

Global Response Management (GRM) is a veteran-led international medical NGO registered in the United States as a 501(c)(3) organization. GRM provides emergency humanitarian and medical help to civilians in Ukraine and Ukrainian refugees in Poland. 

  1. Learn more about their medical work in Ukraine here: https://www.global-response.org/ukraine
  2. To become a volunteer, please submit your application here:  https://www.global-response.org/volunteer
Become a Volunteer AT GRM

 

Volunteer for “International Medical Corps” (NGO)

International Medical Corps is a medical non-governmental organization (NGO) that provides emergency medical and mental help to civilians in Ukraine and neighboring countries. 

  1. Learn more about their medical work in Ukraine here: https://internationalmedicalcorps.org/emergency-response/war-in-ukraine/
  2. To become a volunteer, please submit your application here:  https://internationalmedicalcorps.org/work-with-us/
Become a Volunteer AT IMC

 

Volunteer for “MedGlobal” (NGO)

MedGlobal is a humanitarian and health non-governmental organization (NGO) that provides emergency medical and humanitarian help to Ukrainian refugees, distributing medical supplies and medications, training Ukrainian health professionals on certain skills online or in-person, and supporting field hospitals. 

  1. Learn more about their medical work in Ukraine here: https://medglobal.org/ukraine/
  2. To become a volunteer, please submit your application here:  https://medglobal.org/volunteer/
Become a Volunteer AT MedGlobal
